data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Zhang, Aihuan, Li, Houhun (2012): Descriptions of five new species of the genus Rhopobota Lederer (Lepidoptera, Tortricidae) in China, along with a checklist of all the described Chinese species. Zootaxa 3478: 373-382, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.282284
